column5: Beautiful quiet lakefront home away from home....with lake views from every room. Bring your kids and grandkids to make many great memories. Relax or dine on the 80ft covered porch, or take the kayaks, canoe or paddle boat and drop a line or have a leisure float in the serene cove. Fully equipped kitchen, just bring your groceries...or choose from many restaurants close by. WiFi, Netflix, movie library for all ages, ping pong, air hockey, karaoke, and board games of all kinds. You will remember this getaway forever!
column8: The Lake House at Knob Hill
